name: CI

on:
  pull_request:
    branches:
      - master

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: windows-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 22.14.0

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm install

      - name: Set NODE_OPTIONS
        run: echo "NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules" >> $GITHUB_ENV

      - name: Patch Axios Import
        run: echo "import axios from 'axios'; export default axios;" > node_modules/axios/index.js

      - name: Build Project
        run: npm run build

      - name: Run Tests
        run: node --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/.bin/jest
